name: Nile to City
description:
This is unity 2d game in which there is a cute character lilly which by mistake undergoes under the flow of city river ,this game basically shows how we affected nature and threating it .all the characters in this game is made by me.

Features

Main feature of this game is that it is giving  deep social message other features include 

1 mouse control only 

2 single player

3 creative ,sensitive 

survive and collect sunlight
